name: Acts-as-taggable-on
body:
### ActsAsTaggableOn

This is a fork of [mbleigh/acts-as-taggable-on](http://github.com/mbleigh/acts-as-taggable-on) with some backports to support Rails 2.3
tagline: A tagging plugin for Rails applications that allows for custom tagging along dynamic contexts.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
